content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL, warning “out of fuel”, with furnace_source holding 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS, with fuel inventory (2 coal) and furnace_result containing 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab_input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, research "automation", status: NO_POWER, and electrical_id updated to 11640.
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(2.5, 21.5) with connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5); status: NOT_CONNECTED with warnings “not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”; neighbors include pipe entities at positions (3.5, 23.5), (4.5, 23.5) and (2.5, 24.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with status: NO_FUEL, warning “out of fuel”, fluid_box holding ≈200 units of water at 15°, updated fluid_system [43452], connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5) and steam_output at (-7.5, 24.5); neighbors include pipes at positions (-7.5, 25.5) and (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with status: WORKING, fluid_box holding ≈100 units of water at 15°, updated fluid_system [43452], and connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); neighbors include pipe entities at positions (-8.5, 23.5), (-8.5, 22.5) and (-9.5, 23.5).
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=43452 at position(-6.5, 20.5), status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=43453 at position(-2.5, 20.5), status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=43454 at position(-0.5, 21.5), status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=43459 at position(-3.5, 23.5), status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=43458 at position(-7.5, 25.5), status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=43463 at position(3.5, 25.5), status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=43462 at position(2.5, 24.5), status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=43465 at position(-0.5, 28.5), status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Pipeline Connection Failures with Incorrect Fluid System Identifiers:
  • Repeated attempts using fluid_system identifiers (previously [42764, 42807, 42850, 42893, 42936, 42979, 43022, 43065] and newly attempted 43108, 43151, 43194, 43237, 43280, 43323, 43366, 43409) resulted in no working PipeGroup being found.
  • Tip: Dynamically retrieve and verify the active PipeGroup fluid_system identifier from the current network (e.g. use 43452 when available) before initiating a pipeline connection.

- Hardcoded Fluid System Assumptions:
  • Relying on preset fluid_system values without runtime checks leads to aborted connection attempts.
  • Tip: Implement verification steps to ensure the selected PipeGroup is operational and its configuration matches the current network state.

- Fuel Supply Oversight:
  • The boiler remains unfueled, interrupting the steam cycle.
  • Tip: Replenish the boiler’s fuel inventory promptly to maintain continuous operation.
